channel.title: Items Kept on Death Error 317
channel.description:
Hello,
I recently started up my server and we started to get a little pking community just to find out you dont lose items when you die anywhere in wild, im not sure how to fix this im pretty sure its somewhere in playerassistant but i cant find the exact coding, if you are knowledgeable please leave a post.
PS- im using the teamtorva package

item.title: Items Kept on Death Error 317
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

I thought Austin said he fixed that anti leech xD

requesting nobody to tell him how to fix this lolol.

*hint: it’s commented out

that’s all I’m saying

Read full topic
